byline.contributor: Nate Schweber and Alex Vadukul contributed reporting.

abstract: Brooklyn teenagers Jordan Lewis and Aakif Murray remain in stable condition after being shot at West Indian music festival in Mount Prospect Park; are believed to have been bystanders hit by stray bullets.
lead_paragraph: The police said one teenager was shot in the hip and the other was shot in the torso. They were taken to New York Methodist Hospital in Park Slope and were in stable condition.

headline.main: 2 Teenagers Shot at Festival in Brooklyn Park, Police Say
headline.print_headline: 2 Teenagers Shot at Festival in Brooklyn Park, Police Say

snippet: The police said one teenager was shot in the hip and the other was shot in the torso. They were taken to New York Methodist Hospital in Park Slope and were in stable condition.
